definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: This ambivalence subverts and deconstructs logos centre doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 这种双重性认识是对逻各斯中心主义的颠覆和解构。

sentences.english: The Greeks called them mythos and logos.
sentences.chinese: 希腊人称它们为神话和逻各斯。

sentences.english: The property logos of ultimate goal of human behavior has been characterized by excellent position exists.
sentences.chinese: 终极目标属性逻各斯表征人的行为终极目标优位存在。

sentences.english: Its dominant element is the Logos.
sentences.chinese: 她的首要因素是逻各斯。

sentences.english: "Fen Shen" is akin to the concept of "Logos" – the Word - expounded in biblical positivism.
sentences.chinese: 分身犹如圣经实证主义中的逻各斯。

sentences.english: Logos is imprinted everywhere in the entire structure of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 逻各斯化身成耶稣形象，展现于宇宙结构中。

definition: pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
dualism, belief that the universe is made of two different substance (e.g. mind and matter or good and evil)
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
neo-Platonism (philosophical system combining Platonism with mysticism)
pinyin: xin1 Bo2 la1 tu2 zhu3 yi4
